verses.verse: וֶאֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> And Elisha הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet קָרָ֕א <S%H7121><s%> called לְאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֜וֹ חֲגֹ֣ר <S%H2296><s%> unto him Gird up מָתְנֶ֗יךָ <S%H4975><s%> thy loins וְ֠קַח <S%H3947><s%> and take פַּ֣ךְ <S%H6378><s%> this box הַשֶּׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand וְלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וּבָ֖אתָ <S%H935><s%> And when thou comest שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וּרְאֵֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> thither look out שָׁ֠ם <S%H8033><s%> there יֵה֨וּא <S%H3058><s%> there Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֜ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נִמְשִׁ֗י <S%H5250><s%> of Nimshi וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> and go in וַהֲקֵֽמֹתוֹ֙ <S%H6965><s%> and make him arise up מִתּ֣וֹך <S%H8432><s%> from among אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וְהֵבֵיאתָ֥ <S%H935><s%> and carry אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> חֶ֥דֶר <S%H2315><s%> him to an inner בְּחָֽדֶר׃ <S%H2315><s%> chamber

וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <S%H3947><s%> Then take פַךְ־ <S%H6378><s%> the box הַשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <S%H8081><s%> of oil וְיָצַקְתָּ֣ <S%H3332><s%> and pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> [it] on his head וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <S%H4886><s%> I have anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thee king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וּפָתַחְתָּ֥ <S%H6605><s%> Then open הַדֶּ֛לֶת <S%H1817><s%> the door וְנַ֖סְתָּה <S%H5127><s%> and flee וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תְחַכֶּֽה׃ <S%H2442><s%> and tarry

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הַנַּ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> So the young man הַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> [even] the young man הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וַיָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> And when he came וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> behold the captains הַחַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> of the host יֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <S%H3427><s%> [were] sitting וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> I have an errand לִ֛י אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> for הַשָּׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> to thee O captain וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> And Jehu אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> which מִכֻּלָּ֔נוּ <S%H3605><s%> and he וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Unto which of all us? And he said אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> for הַשָּֽׂר׃ <S%H8269><s%> To thee O captain

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> And he arose וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> and went הַבַּ֔יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> into the house וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> and he poured הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> the oil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> on his head וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מְשַׁחְתִּ֧יךָֽ <S%H4886><s%> I have anointed לְמֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thee king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> over the people יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> [even] over Israel

וְהִ֨כִּיתָ֔ה <S%H5221><s%> And thou shalt smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab אֲדֹנֶ֑יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy master וְנִקַּמְתִּ֞י <S%H5358><s%> that I may avenge דְּמֵ֣י ׀ <S%H1818><s%> the blood עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> of my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets וּדְמֵ֛י <S%H1818><s%> and the blood כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> of all the servants יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> at the hand אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <S%H348><s%> of Jezebel

וְאָבַ֖ד <S%H6><s%> shall perish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> For the whole house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut off לְאַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> from Ahab מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <S%H8366><s%> him that pisseth בְּקִ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> against the wall וְעָצ֥וּר <S%H6113><s%> and him that is shut up וְעָז֖וּב <S%H5800><s%> and left בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab כְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> like the house יָרָבְעָ֣ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָ֑ט <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat וּכְבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> and like the house בַּעְשָׁ֥א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <S%H281><s%> of Ahijah

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִיזֶ֜בֶל <S%H348><s%> Jezebel יֹאכְל֧וּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat הַכְּלָבִ֛ים <S%H3611><s%> And the dogs בְּחֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> in the portion יִזְרְעֶ֖אל <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and none קֹבֵ֑ר <S%H6912><s%> and [there shall be] none to bury וַיִּפְתַּ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> [her] And he opened הַדֶּ֖לֶת <S%H1817><s%> the door וַיָּנֹֽס׃ <S%H5127><s%> and fled

וְיֵה֗וּא <S%H3058><s%> Then Jehu יָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> came forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> to the servants אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> of his lord וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and [one] said לוֹ֙ הֲשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> favor מַדּ֛וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> how בָּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> come הַמְשֻׁגָּ֥ע <S%H7696><s%> this mad הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> [fellow] to thee? And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> You יְדַעְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3045><s%> unto them Ye know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׂיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7879><s%> and his communication

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [It is] false הַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> tell נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now לָ֑נוּ וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> us now And he said כָּזֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְכָזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> he אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus and thus spake אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> over לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he to me saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <S%H4886><s%> I have anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thee king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel

וַֽיְמַהֲר֗וּ <S%H4116><s%> Then they hasted וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> and took אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man בִּגְד֔וֹ <S%H899><s%> his garment וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put תַחְתָּ֖יו <S%H8478><s%> under אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on גֶּ֣רֶם <S%H1634><s%> [it] under him on the top הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of the stairs וַֽיִּתְקְעוּ֙ <S%H8628><s%> and blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> with trumpets וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> saying מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> is king יֵהֽוּא׃ <S%H3058><s%> Jehu

וַיִּתְקַשֵּׁ֗ר <S%H7194><s%> conspired יֵה֛וּא <S%H3058><s%> So Jehu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נִמְשִׁ֖י <S%H5250><s%> of Nimshi אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יוֹרָ֑ם <S%H3141><s%> against Joram וְיוֹרָם֩ <S%H3141><s%> (Now Joram הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become שֹׁמֵ֜ר <S%H8104><s%> had kept בְּרָמֹ֣ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> he and all Israel מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> because חֲזָאֵ֖ל <S%H2371><s%> of Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> of Syria

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> was returned יְהוֹרָ֨ם <S%H3088><s%> Joram הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> But king לְהִתְרַפֵּ֣א <S%H7495><s%> to be healed בִיְזְרְעֶ֗אל <S%H3157><s%> in Jezreel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמַּכִּים֙ <S%H4347><s%> of the wounds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יַכֻּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> had given אֲרַמִּ֔ים <S%H761><s%> which the Syrians בְּהִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וֹ <S%H3898><s%> him when he fought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with חֲזָאֵ֖ל <S%H2371><s%> with Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of Aram וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> Jehu אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> If it be נַפְשְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> your minds אַל־ <S%H408><s%> [then] let none יֵצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> go forth פָלִיט֙ <S%H6412><s%> [nor] escape מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go [לְגִּיד כ] (לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> bewray ק) בְּיִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> [it] in Jezreel

וַיִּרְכַּ֤ב <S%H7392><s%> rode in a chariot יֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> So Jehu וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went יִזְרְעֶ֔אלָה <S%H3157><s%> to Jezreel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יוֹרָ֖ם <S%H3141><s%> for Joram שֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> lay שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וַֽאֲחַזְיָה֙ <S%H274><s%> there And Ahaziah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> was come down לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹרָֽם׃ <S%H3141><s%> Joram
